org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.session.action

Interface ActionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSessionPropertiesActionHandler, DeletePropertyActionHandler, GetIdleTimeActionHandler, GetMaxIdleTimeActionHandler, GetMaxSessionTimeActionHandler, GetPropertyActionHandler, GetPropertyNamesActionHandler, GetSessionInfoActionHandler, GetSessionPropertiesActionHandler, GetTimeLeftActionHandler, IsActiveActionHandler, LogoutActionHandler, LogoutByHandleActionHandler, RefreshActionHandler, SetPropertyActionHandler, UpdateSessionPropertiesActionHandler, ValidateActionHandler

    public interface ActionHandler
    Defines a delegate capable of handling a particular action for a collection or instance
